pageContext.claim: “And now it's -- crime is up by many, many times. And what's happening in New York is so horrible for our country, what they have done. What Mayor de Blasio has done to that city in a short period of time is horrible.”
pageContext.analysis: Some kinds of crimes are more frequent in New York City but overall the crime rate is still well below the records seen in the 1980s and 1990s.
